flawed_nl_solution:
Each 5 by 5 painting is 25 square feet because 5 x 5 = <<5*5=25>>25
All 3 of them take up 75 square feet because 3 x 25 = <<3*25=75>>75
The 10 by 8 painting takes up 80 square feet because 10 x 8 = <<10*8=80>>80
These four paintings take up 155 square feet because 80 + 75 = <<80+75=155>>155
The final painting is 40 square feet because 200-155 = <<200-155=40>>40
If it is 5 feet wide it is 8 feet tall because 40 / 5 = 8
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
